Title: Children's Star Wars BB8 black and orange flashing watch SWM3077
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Children's Star Wars BB8 black and orange flashing watch SWM3077 RRP £19.99 Now £13.99 Description This children’s flashing Star Wars watch is a bright addition to the Disney Star Wars watch collection. It features a dynamic print of the character BB8 on the watch face, set within the bright orange casing. With the orange bezel featuring a number of notches and numbers around the outside in black, and illuminating with flashing lights at the touch of a button, this watch really is great for techy kids who want their watch to look the part. A black rubber strap makes this a comfortable choice, easily fastened by the matching vibrant orange buckle. The digital display also makes telling the time easier, with three buttons upon the side of the casing to show the date, time and to change the settings. The width of the watch is approximately 35mm. We are authorised stockists of Disney Star Wars watches, and this product will be sent brand new. Every purchase also comes with a one year manufacturer’s warranty.
